clientname.description: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues
clientname.title: Clientname

subscription.description: Leave empty for non-durable topic subscriptions or queues
subscription.title: Subscription

sink.description: Name of the queue of topic to listen to
sink.title: Queue / Topic

jsonParseBody.description: Whether to parse the body to an object
jsonParseBody.title: JSON Parse Body

onlyBody.description: Whether to return only the body property
onlyBody.title: Only Body

jsonConvertByteArrayToString.description: Whether to convert JSON Body content (["body"]["content"]) from Byte Array to string. Needed for Azure Service Bus.
jsonConvertByteArrayToString.title: Convert Body To String

containerId.description: Will be used to pass to the RHEA Backend as container_id
containerId.title: Container ID

reconnect.description: Whether to automatically reconnect if disconnected
reconnect.title: Reconnect

parallelProcessing.description: Whether to process messages in parallel
parallelProcessing.title: Parallel Processing

pullMessagesNumber.description: Number of messages to pull from the bus for every cicle
pullMessagesNumber.title: Messages per Cicle

sleepTime.description: Milliseconds to sleep after every cicle
sleepTime.title: Sleep Time
